created_at.description: The date and time at which the customer was created in UTC format

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last customer update in UTC format

external_id.description: External identifier from a third-party system

metadata.description: Additional metadata as a JSON object

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment method

billing_address.description: Billing address associated with the payment method

card.description: Encrypted and tokenized card information provided by Evervault

phone.description: Phone number associated with the payment method

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last payment method update in UTC format

postal_code.description:
Avs check postal code result
Available values: `fail`, `pass`, `unavailable`, `unchecked`

street_address.description:
Avs check street address result.
Available values: `fail`, `pass`, `unavailable`, `unchecked`

amount.description: Payment amount in the specified currency (e.g., cents)

amount_usd.description: Payment amount converted to USD (e.g., cents)

created_at.description: The date and time at which the payment was created in UTC format.

currency_code.description: The 3-letter currency code in ISO 4217 format. e.g. use USD for US dollars.

metadata.description:
Custom metadata associated with the payment
A dictionary of key-value pairs.

payment_token_type.description: Type of card token used, if applicable

payment_type.description: Type of payment (e.g., card, bank transfer)

refunded_amount.description: Amount refunded from the original payment

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last payment update in UTC format.

countries.description: List of country codes (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) where this price applies

created_at.description: The date and time at which the plan was created in UTC format

interval_count.description: Number of billing periods per cycle

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last plan update in UTC format

currency.description: The 3-letter currency code in ISO 4217 format. e.g. use USD for US dollars

created_at.description: The date and time at which the subscription was created in UTC format

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last subscription update in UTC format

metadata.description:
Custom metadata associated with the subscription
A dictionary of key-value pairs.

next_billing_date.description: Next scheduled billing date for the subscription

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last subscription update in UTC format

last4.description: Last 4 digits of the card number

formatted_amount_rounded.description: Amount formatted and rounded as a string
